comments.author: Adriana
comments.body: Yah, but, can you do it on a townie?

comments.author: Steve
comments.body: Hmm...The Townie would struggle in the small ravines that run down the middle of the road on the 15% uphill sections; however, it would be much safer for the descent of Arkansas Mountain Road's volleyball sand!

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Sounds like a fun ride, Wild Man. Now let's try it after a good snow, eh? DU
